text: Richard Andrew Pettigrew (born June 10, 1930) is an American politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Pettigrew was born in Charleston, West Virginia. He was in the Florida House of Representatives for the 97th district from 1963 to 1972. From 1971 to 1972, he was Speaker of the Florida House of Representatives. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1930 births Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Tampa, Florida Category:Politicians from West Virginia Category:People from Charleston, West Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Richard A. Pettigrew
